title: Video: Stevie Parker – The Cure
body:
This new track from **Stevie Parker** is a real grower.

The songwriting has some hugely endearing 70’s inspirations, whilst her immaculate vocal is set against a sleek production backdrop. Get lost in The Cure below.

_So won’t you save me / from myself again_

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
